titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a postage stamp should be issued to honor the Jewish War Veterans of the United States of America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/6/2001--Introduced. Calls for the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee of the U.S. Postal Service to recommend and the Postmaster General to issue a postage stamp to honor the Jewish War Veterans of the United States of America.
